user.title: Set up Centauri Carbon Spool Manager
user.description:
This will install automatic filament tracking for your 3D printer.

**What gets installed:**
• 4 spool tracking entities
• Material & density profiles (PLA, PETG, ABS, TPU, Nylon, ASA)
• Print history logging
• Undo last print feature
• Dashboard configurations

**After installation:**
1. Still need to add one line to configuration.yaml (shown in logs)
2. Configure your printer entity names
3. Add dashboard via UI or configuration.yaml

Click Submit to continue.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single instance is allowed.
